name: Brevet Major-General Alexander Hays
battle: Hays commanded a division on the Gettysburg campaign.

name: Brigadier-General Robert L. McCook
battle: Shot by guerrillas, while lying sick in an ambulance.

name: Brevet Brigadier-General Griffin A. Stedman, Jr
Colonel Joseph Thoburn
note: Thoburn commanded a division during the entire Shenandoah campaign, and was in command of it at the time of his death.
